content:
Hi all. A new page is available on the UTG confluence page for Project Management information: http://confluence.hl7.org:8090/display/VOC/UTG+Project+Management. There is information about the project milestones and their timelines. You can download the Project Plan at the bottom of the page to view tasks and assignments. We are currently in 'Development Cycle 1'.

Please use this stream to report on task completion.
